mapper.select: SELECT SC.SUB_CATEGORY_CODE , SC.NAME FROM tbl_sub_category SC WHERE SC.ACTIVE = TRUE ORDER BY NAME DESC
SELECT C.SUPER_CATEGORY_CODE , C.NAME FROM tbl_super_category C WHERE C.ACTIVE = TRUE ORDER BY NAME DESC

SELECT SC.SUB_CATEGORY_CODE , SC.NAME AS SUB_CATEGORY_NAME , C.SUPER_CATEGORY_CODE , C.NAME AS SUPER_CATEGORY_NAME FROM tbl_sub_category SC INNER JOIN tbl_super_category C ON SC.SUPER_CATEGORY_CODE = C.SUPER_CATEGORY_CODE WHERE SC.ACTIVE = TRUE AND C.ACTIVE = TRUE ORDER BY C.NAME DESC, SC.NAME DESC

SELECT SC.SUB_CATEGORY_CODE , SC.NAME AS SUB_CATEGORY_NAME , C.SUPER_CATEGORY_CODE , C.NAME AS SUPER_CATEGORY_NAME FROM tbl_sub_category SC INNER JOIN tbl_super_category C ON SC.SUPER_CATEGORY_CODE = C.SUPER_CATEGORY_CODE WHERE SC.SUPER_CATEGORY_CODE = #{ superCategoryCode }
